skillTree.name: Ancestral Grudge
skillTree.description: All Dwarfs despise the Greenskins, for the urki and grobi are the prime agents in the Times of Woe.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +15% when fighting against Greenskins

skillTree.name: Resolute
skillTree.description: Dwarfs are resolute - once they commit to charging the foe, they put all their strength behind that initial blow.

skillTree.name: Relentless
skillTree.description: Dwarfs are not fast, yet they will soldier on, always moving despite any hazards encountered.

skillTree.name: Rune of Grimnir
skillTree.description: The endless courage of the Warrior God, directed to bolster this Dawi’s own reserves.

skillTree.name: Immortality
skillTree.description: Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no…

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

skillTree.name: Break Open the Casks!
skillTree.description: Dwarfen craftsmanship ensures any weapon is infinitely more likely to run out of ammunition before succumbing to the stress of battle!

skillTree.name: Requisition
skillTree.description: If a Master Engineer wants something, he'll get it. Quartermasters can rarely refuse a demanding Guild engineer.

skillTree.name: Triangulation
skillTree.description: Engineers use number-lore to work out the best trajectories and prime killing arcs for their war machines.

skillTree.name: Overseer
skillTree.description: Those Engineers that spend their lives underground have a good understanding of war in the caverns.

skillTree.name: Sapper
skillTree.description: A Sapper excels at breaking entrenched foes. He can quickly get artillery into the best position.

skillTree.name: Zhufbar 42-Pounders
skillTree.description: "Bring the Barag forwards! Hand me that spyglass!"

skillTree.name: Defensive Coordinator
skillTree.description: Master Engineers familiar with defensive formations use their centuries of experience in sieges.

effects.description: Reload time reduction: +3% for towers during siege battles
Reload time reduction: +8% for towers during siege battles
Reload time reduction: +15% for towers during siege battles

skillTree.name: Ballistics Instructor
skillTree.description: Those Engineers conversant in ballistics know how best to increase the ranges of their weapons.

skillTree.name: Dead Eye
skillTree.description: A dead eye shot is an Engineer or Thunderer that can hit a target at over five hundred (Dwarfen) paces.

skillTree.name: Hand-Loaded
skillTree.description: Each round delicately crafted to deliver death with a personal touch.

skillTree.name: Bare Essentials
skillTree.description: While many engineers carry innumerable tools on their person, some espouse the art of carrying only five different protractors.

skillTree.name: Barak Varr Handshake
skillTree.description: By which one greets grobi and urk alike.

skillTree.name: Grudge-Raker
skillTree.description: With this double-barreled, pellet-spewing device, one can riddle a single target or blast a swathe into oncoming troops.

effects.description: "Grudge Raker" ammunition (decreased range and increased number of projectiles)

skillTree.name: Carry a Big Stick
skillTree.description: The deadly blast of the Grudge-raker inspires fear in even the most dimwitted creature.

skillTree.name: Percussive Maintenance
skillTree.description: In possession of countless irreplaceable tools and devices, no Master Engineer goes down without a fight!

skillTree.name: Technical Enhancements
skillTree.description: Engineers always tinker, naming these tweaks "enhancements" - most do improve whatever contraption they are working on.

skillTree.name: Cinderblast Shell
skillTree.description: "Stand Back! These are Dawr, but this is only the milluzth attempt!"

skillTree.name: {{tr:agent_action_name_increase_mobility}}
skillTree.description: Whether it be training harder, travelling lighter, eating less or sleeping better, there's always a way to draw more from the day.

effects.description: Increase Mobility action: Movement range is increased by an additional 5%
Increase Mobility action: Movement range is increased by an additional 10%
Increase Mobility action: Movement range is increased by an additional 15%

skillTree.name: {{tr:agent_action_name_boost_income}}
skillTree.description: Such magic-users may be wise and able to offer sage advice, especially if they have scried the region.

effects.description: Boost Income action: Income is modified by an additional 2%
Boost Income action: Income is modified by an additional 4%
Boost Income action: Income is modified by an additional 6%

skillTree.name: {{tr:agent_action_name_steal_technology}}
skillTree.description: Oft-times, though you may have much, what you want the most is what your rivals have; such envy focuses the mind and creativity.

effects.description: Steal Technology action: Research rate is increased by an additional 3%
Steal Technology action: Research rate is increased by an additional 6%
Steal Technology action: Research rate is increased by an additional 10%

skillTree.name: {{tr:agent_action_name_wound}}
skillTree.description: Such a champion will not bend or break, but slay in their Lord's name.

effects.description: Wound action: Additional 5% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 12% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 21% chance of wounding target

skillTree.name: {{tr:agent_action_name_block_army}}
skillTree.description: To sow discord and confuse the enemy, sending them down the wrong route or befuddling their senses.

effects.description: Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -3%
Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -8%
Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -15%

skillTree.name: Specialist
skillTree.description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

skillTree.name: Ancestral Blood - Grimnir
skillTree.description: This brave Dawi can trace his lineage back to Grimnir, the Warrior-God.

skillTree.name: Ancestral Blood - Grungni
skillTree.description: This industrious Dawi can trace his lineage back to Grungni, God of Mines and Smiths.

skillTree.name: Ancestral Blood - Valaya
skillTree.description: This loyal Dawi can trace his lineage back to Valaya, Goddess of Healing and Protection.

skillTree.name: Fleet-Footed
skillTree.description: Being fleet of foot is useful in a fight… or when trying to get away afterwards!

skillTree.name: Cunning
skillTree.description: Deceit is a perfectly acceptable means of attack.

skillTree.name: Determined
skillTree.description: Having a modicum of resolve is useful in a world that continually tests it.

skillTree.name: Confident
skillTree.description: Self-belief is a fine thing when not misplaced.

skillTree.name: Disciplined
skillTree.description: Always in control, this one leaves no stone unturned and nothing to chance.

skillTree.name: Perceptive
skillTree.description: Although actually reading minds is not in their skillset, this one has extraordinary insight into the motives of others.

skillTree.name: Aggressive
skillTree.description: If you're gonna die, you may as well die with your boots on.

skillTree.name: Tough
skillTree.description: Rugged, resistant, and almost unbreakable, this being can and will take on all comers.

skillTree.name: Strong
skillTree.description: Well built, robust. Powerful.

skillTree.name: Weapon Master
skillTree.description: If you can swing, slash, stab, gouge, or shoot it, this warrior has mastered every aspect of its use.

skillTree.name: Strategist
skillTree.description: This being has a plan - not just a game plan, but a master plan to achieve their long-term aims.

skillTree.name: Tactician
skillTree.description: Careful planning, knowledge of the terrain and the weaknesses of the enemy are the key to victory.
